website_summaries.verdict: Updated top-selling MP3 player by Apple. The sleek design, first-rate technology, and generous storage space make it worth the pricey investment.
pros: The revamped 7th-gen model that offers a 10 fusion chip for super responsive performance
Gorgeous retina display and reliable WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity
Available in several fun colors and in different storage capacities - 32, 128, or 256GB
cons: Expensive, but you're getting state-of-the-art entertainment technology
Takes a while to learn how to use the many functions and capabilities

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for CHILDREN
customer_reviews.text: Just to point out, the iPod touch is perfect for children under 12 who do not need a phone service, but like a portable device for app availability. I am confused why so many adults can not understand this. If I had to guess, Apple was thinking of children when marketing the iPod touch.
customer_reviews.author: helena joyce

customer_reviews.title: Why are people mad about these?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those who LOVE music but don’t want to fill up all their storage on their phones. I needed something that allowed me to listen to MY music when WiFi wasn’t available and I have an expansive music collection. Also perfect for saving some podcasts for a flight if you don’t want to pay for in flight WiFi. Love the speed and features. Those who are bitter that it does more than the original iPods are never going to be happy with anything. Get the iPod, listen to music, be happy it’s not 1785.

customer_reviews.title: These iPod touches are fragile
customer_reviews.text: I purchase two iPod touches to gives to my kids for Christmas. It has been less than a week, and one is already at an Apple repair center because a light drop (no cracks or breaks involved) caused a black screen with white vertical lines. Apple said it could be easily fixed/replaced. Two days later, I witnessed my older daughter drop it less than 6 inches, again no cracks or breaks, but now she has the black screen with white vertical lines. What is happening??

customer_reviews.text: Completely stopped working after one charge. Would recommend buying for my more reputable seller.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Apple products are all overpriced. They work well, but their battery-life and design that make it impossible for consumers to add a micro-memory card or replace a battery are maddening. How long can Apple go on taking advantage of their "cool" reputation and making obscene amounts of money from us gullible consumers? This was purchased for my wife who likes the ease of operation of the iPod to replace an iPod that had a failing battery after just two years. My Android tablet is still going strong after five years and a new battery that cost $10. The Nexus cost half as much as the iPod and works as well, if not better.

It came in the original Apple box, and it looked like I just bought it from the Apple store! The battery life goes a little fast, but the speakers are very loud for such a small device. This is all she ever dreamed of!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Glad Apple is continuing with the iPod Touch.

Plus, I don't care much for the phone interrupting my music. I just want a great device for playing my music. And with iTunes, I can easily update this iPod, my latest version iPad, and my iPhone. My only gripe is I really like the fingerprint touch for getting into my iPad and iPhone. I wish this latest generation iPod had that feature.

I have tried it with different full size headphones, IEM headphones and it is doing a great job. I am very happy.

customer_reviews.author: Jaime Hatheway

customer_reviews.title: The perfect music maker!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore this product & it really is a very lightweight device. Being an Apple device this iPod Touch is great music & lots of storage at 256GB.
customer_reviews.author: GenieP

customer_reviews.title: A great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This was my 4th iPod over the years which I have since returned due to a malfunctioning touch screen. I was very unsatisfied with the capacity. Apple has bloated the operating system so much that I was only able to load about 22 gb on this 32 gb device! My suggestion is that you consider another brand of dedicated MP3 player and skip all the nonsense. My last iPod touch failed after only 2 years, so I should I been wiser not to choose Apple in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: B. Young

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have For My Daughter!!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my daughter's 4th Ipod. She uses it religiously every single day and dogs them pretty bad. I usually buy from the actual Apple website, but because I wanted it fast, I ordered from Amazon. It came next day, my daughter needless to say is happy.
customer_reviews.author: MsCherryMoon

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a classic iPod after about 10 years just because my 160 iPod won't upgrade anymore. I have a love hate relationship with the iPod touch. The programing is great. It's easy to Sync and create all these playlists, and lots of apps are included. The battery sucks. My classic iPod lasted about 2-3 days, and I played it for hours. This device's battery lasts 1 day tops. The touch screen is hard to use sometimes, the screen is so small it's annoying for a touchscreen device.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Fregoso

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even last a year (just 9 months to be exact). The device went dead today and won’t turn on at all, not even when plugged into the charger. We are an Apple household, so this is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Crickett

customer_reviews.title: One drop and it wont turn on now
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. I've never had a good experience with iPods. I give up. I'm never buying an ipod again. Update: I held the power button and low volume button till it turned back on. So I'm glad it wasn't completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Hall

customer_reviews.title: Major Problems
customer_reviews.text: I’m am so upset about my last two purchases of the supposedly newest iPod. The first one died within the day. The screen is odd and dark in places as your setting it up. Within the hour it went to black lines. Sent it back to purchase another one. Same issue !!! I’m going to return the 2nd one and purchase directly through Apple. The newer model asks to set up an 8 code password. These only ash for a 4 code password!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamera L Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Got as christmas gifts for a 10 and 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: We didn't want to get my younger brothers actual phones so we thought an iPod would be perfect for playing games, listening to music, and being able to facetime and message us. Which wasn't the case, all the adults and older children have apple iPhones so you would think setting up an apple iPod would be a breeze. To this day we are unable to use messages, call or facetime on the iPods. Why does it have the apps already installed if we're unable to used them? Won't be buying electronics off amazon anymore, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Apache Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Apple Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this iPod for my wife so she could listen to the type of music and audio books she prefers. Basically I didn't want her commandeering my personal iPod. She and I are very happy with Apple's iPod product and the 32mg storage is more than ample for music storage and playback.
customer_reviews.author: OldTerry

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Ive only had this a phew days, but! I cracked my Ipod touch 5th generation, so, I got a Ipod touch 7th generation, Its so cool! When you flip the screen onto the surface (Like a table or chair or whatever) It turns off, and when you flip it back over (like towards the ceiling or you or whatever) It turns back on! And the volume buttons! omg the volume! When you turn up or turn down the volume, it doesn't show you the volume setting in the middle of the screen, its off to the left side! Anyway, I love my new ipod! And my sisters wants one for her birthday lol
customer_reviews.author: Elyce

customer_reviews.title: I Can't Figure It Out!!
customer_reviews.text: There were absolutely no instructions with this unit. I previously had an i-pod Nano, and am trying to download the library onto this Touch unit, but cannot. Don't know if I should approach Apple or Geek Squad, but feel like I wasted the money by buying this unit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jenson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We have a massive library on CDs transferred to iTunes. When our old hard-drive i-pod died, we made do with a small one - 16 GB. It was frustrating to have to manage play lists and routinely change the i-pod's contents only to wish we still had songs we just removed. This i-pod holds our entire library - over 400 CDs - and half the chip is still open. The interface is familiar and easy. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far.
customer_reviews.text: My old one stopped working so had to get this one. I like it so far, mostly got it to play music while at the gym. It does a lot more than my old one so just taking a minute to figure everything out. My old one was much smaller which I preferred but I think they stopped making it. I got a case for it as it is pretty slippery otherwise. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad model. Had the white screen stay on within the first 2 weeks and couldn't get it to work. Tinkered with it for a while and it finally went back to almost normal but the edges of the screen still had a strobing effect. Would NOT recommend this iPod. It's just a big rip off and it was more than likely made by forced child labor in Apple's foxcon assembly plant in China.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Time waste for something that won’t work
customer_reviews.text: Got it but it doesn’t appear in iTunes, tried everything, rebooted like I had a windows pc. Nothing has worked. I got online with Apple and went through the whole thing over and over again, but nothing works. They had me reboot in safe mode, but then Apple closed the chat before it could come back online. That didn’t work. Basically now re-install everything. What a waste of money and not even Apple knows why. Completely frustrated at this point.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my grandson.
customer_reviews.text: He loves the Ipod. In this pandemic time it is especially helpful. He is able to use a kid version on Messenger and talk to many of his classmates. He really loves country music and this will store a lot of music. He and his take it along when they go fishing so they can have music. It has been great for him.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Handy Expensive Gadget.
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a regular MP3 player. This device has so many more uses. But, it is expensive. I use it in the car, but had to buy a car charger because of the short battery lie. Apple has its own way of doing things and learning the secrets was like being initiated in a mystery cult. Now, I have an IPAD,. too.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Ayars

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with chipped screen.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a last minute gift, but when it arrived I saw that the screen was chipped in the corner, it was for a child's birthday, so I didn't think they would mind a small chip. Only hours after receiving it, it was knocked off a short coffee table and fell onto the carpet where the screen completely shattered. I'm assuming the chipped screen weakened it allowing it to shatter, beyond disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Total equipment malfunction.
customer_reviews.text: About a month after having this, the screen started shorting out and displaying vertical grey and white lines. No damage or drops ever occurred. It would come back to a normal picture then do it again a few days later. I took it to Apple support and they, of course said there is nothing wrong with it. After another month or so passed, the screen was on the grey and white stripes almost constantly and the device was not usable at all. Unfortunately, there is no way to get it fixed and we have a useless iPod. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jami Allen

customer_reviews.title: I want my old Ipod back
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap. Apple has hired too many Windoz programmers. Navigating this think is a joke. Nothing is intuitive. All these useless features that are redundant with a smart phone. Useless apps wasting memory, What NO FM radio? Jesus was a waste of 200 bucks this is the last apple product I ever buy. It really sucks all my music is on iTunes. I feel so betrayed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Myers

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for music and videos.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this because we have one all ready and we really like it. And now we just have one. Because we got Robbed and some one stole our other one. But now we have a new one
customer_reviews.author: ismael gomez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!
customer_reviews.text: This iPod hasn't worked from the second my son opened it on Christmas morning. So frustrating! It has ruined Christmas as this was the only thing he asked for! I dont know if they are selling refurbished products or what is going on but this is just ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iPod Touch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 10 yr old. Added her to my family sharing apple plan for safety which Allowed her to set up an email to link to the iPod (which is required). I did download a phone app so she can use as a phone when on wireless connection. No cell data on an iPod Touch. iPod Touch fits what I’m allowing her to have at this age. Because she is set up on my family sharing as a child, I can set limits and restrictions as well as lock her out at a certain time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Constant Problems
customer_reviews.text: This iPod has been constant trouble. The screen frequently goes out for awhile and the battery does not stay charged. It will reset itself after hours of charging but with only light use, it happens again. I already returned it once and we’re on our second one (of course outside of the return window). I would not recommend buying something this pricey from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Somer

customer_reviews.title: Portable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it died three weeks after purchasing. Fortunately Amazon and Apple arranged for a replacement immediately.I listen to podcasts on my time off and I love it.It is so lightweight I can take it everywhere unlike my phone or ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K

customer_reviews.title: Everything an IPhone can do, except call ;)
customer_reviews.text: I got this product for my Autistic 5 year old. He is into electronic and always wants to play with our phone, but he mostly got a kick of calling ppl and hanging up as he enjoys the dial tones. Now with the IPod he can play all the games he wants (ABC Mouse, PBS Kids, Nick Jr. etc) without us having to worry about him calling ppl. The package arrived on time and was safely delivered. I recommend the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No capacity
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this purchase. I bought the iPod touch to replace my iPod classic that quit working after many years. My old iPod held over 3500 songs and 50 audio books from iTunes. This new does not have the capacity to hold nearly that much. I've had to remove 45 of my books and about a third of the music.
customer_reviews.author: Becky R Zeedick

customer_reviews.title: Broke in two weeks
customer_reviews.text: It’s loud, battery life standard but it was our daughters Christmas gift and it only lasted 2 weeks and quit working. Had to get another one which amazon was awesome swapping very quick no hassle but still worried about the quality long term.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: I had no idea what I what I was getting into
customer_reviews.text: This thing brings the thunder that I remember from my old iPod Shuffle. My Android Phone could not do that. I am happy to be back in the Apple ecosystem. The iTunes App from the Microsoft Store actually works again on my PC. I am a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley N.

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed!  What happened to Apple?
customer_reviews.text: I love the ipod but was very disappointed because after under 8 months, the front screen started bowing and separating from the front of the frame. Notice the separation in the photo above. The second photo shows clearly the separation of the screen from the frame. Makes it challenging to press the Home Button.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Harris-Chin

customer_reviews.title: Screen messed up
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our daughters 7th birthday. Ipod was cute but after a 2 weeks the screen glitches and turns fuzzy grey and white lines. Hoping Apple store can fix it or we are losing $200 😥 Since it was through a 3rd party.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Get the product protection
customer_reviews.text: Worked well while it lasted. Dead after a month and a half. Dropped about 3 feet while in a hard case and glass protection screen over it. No damage was done at all to the case but apparently jostling it was enough to kill it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Desaulniers
